column5: Hey all  Just wondering if anyone uses this line and likes it?  I was thinking about getting it in 20LB or 30LB for a baitcaster to either flip jigs or troll hardbody baits for walleye.  Thanks.  G
Based on a video I found I don't think it's ideal to cast with on a baitcaster but might be amazing for trolling.  So if anyone uses it on a baitcaster please let me know.
Nothing about it makes sense to me. Still using regular PPro.
Hahaha that was pretty much what I told geoff last night.  Same with superslick, na thanks.  Ill stick with normal PP
